Hack to Help Hampton Roads

Our team created Hack the Vote at Hack to Help HR at Dominion Enterprises.

Saturday - October 24, 2015

1 minute read âˆ™ 64 words

Name

Hack to Help Hampton Roads

Organizer

Dominion Enterprises

Location

Dominion Enterprises - Norfolk, Virginia

Date

October 23rd to 24th, 2015

Role

Participant from Hampton University

About

One of the most fun hackathons I attended. Teamed up with some really fun people, mostly from ODU.

Project

Hack the Vote

Change the world, know your candidate.

rcodonnell/code4hr-voting

Contribute to code4hr-voting development by creating an account on GitHub.
